name: Twins and Triangles
description:
This game was made in 4.5 hours by Filip Novotný for Trijam #112, theme "50 % is enough".

You control two characters here, one with WAD and the other one with arrows. Press Tab to switch camera.

Made in Godot Engine

No textures used

The music is one of my songs I composed earlier in Bandpass.

Don't forget to listen to everything what they are saying! :)

(In case of sound tearing when using Chrome try different browser.)
